title: WNetAddConnection
extract: WNetAddConnection. The WNetAddConnection function enables the calling application to connect a local device to a network resource. A successful connection is persistent, meaning that Windows automatically restores the connection during subsequent logon operations.Aug 23, 2006
extract_html: WNetAddConnection. The WNetAddConnection function enables the calling application to connect a local device to a network resource. A successful connection is persistent, meaning that Windows automatically restores the connection during subsequent logon operations.Aug 23, 2006
